description: INS and DTX files are typically packaged together in a .ZIP archive. To run an INS file, first, extract the files from the ZIP archive using a Zip-decompression utility. Then, open the INS file in a LaTeX application or type latex filename.ins at the command line if the LaTeX command-line utilities are installed.

common_filenames.description: [same name as accompanying DTX file].ins - The INS file bears the same name as the DTX file it is packaged with in the ZIP archive.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .ins file in Microsoft Notepad
images.caption: INS file open in Microsoft Notepad
